text: Acho Chakatouny (1895–1957) was an Armenian actor, film director and makeup artist associated with the silent era.Capua p.191 Chakatouny was born in Yerevan, then part of the Russian Empire. Following the Russian Revolution of 1917 he fled into exile, and settled in France. ==Selected filmography== * The Man with the Hispano (1926) * Michel Strogoff (1926) * Napoleon (1927) * The White Devil (1930) * The Lady of Lebanon (1934) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Michelangelo Capua.
